values:
so i'm a little mad at the fact that last night my dad said that i was doing a good job on my diet a little bit ago. All i said to him was, it worked so well because i wasn't eating. He then told me that sometimes "thats what you have to do." 

so yeah i am gaining back everything that i lost back in feb. because i am actually eating and am getting my appitite back. not to happy about that one, but i am finally able to eat! YAY!!!

okay gotta get to clas, just wanted to share about what my dad said. (and apparently he wants me to go back to not eating)
http://gigawhat.livejournal.com/16314.html

okay, so, i know i haven't posted in awhile. but i didn't realize it had been 15 weeks! the reason i know this is because buttons sent me a nudge, which is cool, but it let me know that i suck at keeping this thing up.

soooooooo......yeah, A LOT has been going on in the life-o-step-on-me. or at least it is about to get even more hectic!!! between the drinking, classes, concerts, and camp that is going to be happening within the next month...i don't know what to do. i'm starting to get into one of my yearly moods where i isolate myself from everyone and avoid my phone. i just don't feel like talking to anyone. so if anything important is going on or ya just feel like calling.....leave me a message and i'll eventually call you back. oh, and not to mention that i am starting to smoke. it is starting to be my way of releaving myself from stress. i know, not good. 

just in case you haven't heard, yes, i will be back at camp this summer as the....dun dun dun....pool director. i am SUPER nervous and VERY excited. i have to take about 3 classes before June 3rd and i am getting SUPER frustrated because i can't find one of them when i need/am able to take it. UGH!!!!! 

okay, i have to end the update ther because i have to get up at 7am to sit in on a classroom. i will try and update some more when i get the chance!
http://gigawhat.livejournal.com/15983.html

sooooo i totally came to visit my mom to eat lunch.....aaaaand i took control of her computer! muahahahaha!!!

buttttt i can't stay on for too long because they monitor it, nah humbug!!!

okay, i really want to add more but the keyboard is REALLY pissing me off. will update when i get home.

fyi....found my passport,YAY!!! AND i'm going with billybob on saturday so i am SUPER happy.
http://gigawhat.livejournal.com/15172.html

sooooo, i have no clue where my passport is! AND I LEAVE IN (about) A WEEK!!!! URGH!!!!

okay just wanted to share!

hope you all have a wonderful Christmas/Holiday weekend!
http://gigawhat.livejournal.com/14983.html

last night was a little awkward, so i made up for it with drinks, although it doesn't take much to do me in. a shot of cuervo and 3-4 smirnoff's and i was gone. last night was also when billibob told me that they finally found out what was wrong with his grandfather. he has cancer. i didn't want to ask too many questions because he already sounded down about it. he said that there isn't anything they can do about it. i hate times like these. his grandfather is a cute little man. 

on that note, i'm off
http://gigawhat.livejournal.com/14793.html

he's being assy, go figure!

ugh! i hate it when guys are around other guys and have to act like what they are not!

ASSSSSSSY!
http://gigawhat.livejournal.com/14518.html

WOW!!! IT was intense last night and was something that we BOTH needed. apparently i sound more relaxed than usual, or so i'm told. i know i've said this before, but you get to read it again......

HE IS THE CUTEST THING E.V.E.R!!!

in other news, i'm going to a lesbian/gay bar tonight with ashley up in baltimore. she REALLY wants to hook up with someone, so i am going to give some moral support along with her sister and her sister's girlfriend. (oh and also for the alchy-hol) but before ALL of that it shopping with the mom to get somthing for the dad for christmas. 

t-minus 2 weeks or so til i leave for 3 weeks. SUPER nervous about it and i'm trying to get as much as i can for the 15 hour plane ride to uruguay and then other things for the ride back (another 15hrs). i'm SUPER nervous! 

alrighty, i think thats all i have to say for now......stay tuned :)
http://gigawhat.livejournal.com/14134.html

wow, major back-pain-age going on over here!!! and my parents are missing. i leave my room after waking up to say hi, and there is no sign of them. but ah well.....they are probably at the gym.

yesterday was my most favoritest day ever!!! i pretty much spent it all with billybob. if only everytime we were together was like last night. 

with every holiday, i always want to send people things or cards, just to say hey how are you, even though we really haven't talked for a year or two. so i buy the cards (a lot of them), write them out, and never send the damn things. or i buy the cards and that is it. so after i get off of the comuter (which is difficult for me to do for some odd reason), i am goning to get busy with it. i even named today do cards and homework day. i love naming the days (ex. be productive day), and not actually do what i say i'll do. a huge ARG! goes out to procrastination.

uruguay is in a little over 3 weeks. i am dreading it. being in a country where i am the only one that doesn't speak the language is going to SUCK SOME MAJOR ASS!!! if it were for maybe, one week, that would be different because that would come and go, no problem! BUT 3 WEEKS!!!!! what am i to do......oh just to add on a bit more of complaining....3 weeks of no cell phone or internet, being cut off from EVERYONE! and i'll be with my sister. shesh, i have a feeling i will be on my own a lot in the month of january. i asked billybob to come, but he can't take off for 3 weeks straight annndddd he doesn't fly (because he's never done it before). 
Billybob asked me last night "what am i going to do without you for 3 weeks?", i thought that was cute, but i was thinking the same thing about him.

okay, i'm going to get to the cards.homework before this entry turns into a novel. (i know i can find something else to complain about)

HEY KITT KATT!!!
http://gigawhat.livejournal.com/13904.html

so last night billybob and i decided that we are going to rebel against my parents. he stayed until 1:30!! of course i was freaking out a bit because that is what i do when i go against what i know is wrong. although, i was happy about it because he was in a bit of a cuddly mood last night. i hate that he is sooooo freakin cute!!!! ARG!!!

this past week, i''ve been subbing at Matthew Henson Middle Scool. it isn't my fav. place, but it pays. they NEVER know where they are going to put me unil about 10 minutes after the bell rings and i am frantically running EVERYWHERE. i'm thinking i might not go back. but i dunno. seems like i ONLY work with the special ed kids, which i don't mind, but it gets difficult. 

i have more to post, but i gotta go.......adios
http://gigawhat.livejournal.com/13577.html

sooo....not sure if ya'll have noticed, BUT in almost all of my journal entries, there are misspelt words or just a misspelt word. i know this because i have no life and read over my entries! 
I soke with splash on the computer today, and i miss her loads! she's thinking about coming back to camp this summer, which would be AWESOME!! with a super duper capital A!!! 
i know i've said this before, but i just can't get enough of billybob. i love everything he does. its pathetic. he is the cutest thing EVER!!! i just wish he wasn't afraid of flying because then he could come with me to uruguay in january. 
hmm.....i'm trying to think if there are anymore random things i can tell ya while i'm still on here, but i can't think of anything. So when i do, i'll be sure to post more :)
http://gigawhat.livejournal.com/13389.html

i'm thinking either england, california, or a cruise on march! 

is anyone else interested?
http://gigawhat.livejournal.com/13123.html

so the funniest thing happened today! my mom was calling comcast to get the sports package for my dad. i was washing dishes so i could barely hear what was going on, but the lady on the phone was sounding pretty sensual, a little too sensual for a cable operator. so i turned off the water and looked back. my mom had this huge smile on her face, and at that moment my dad told her to hang up the phone because we might get charged.
turns out, she called one of those phone sex hotlines!!!! it was hilarious. i asked her what they said because i didn't her anything, and she just said all she remembered was they said something about "speading eagle". 

TOO FREAKING FUNNY!!!!!
http://gigawhat.livejournal.com/12952.html

so yeah, more complaining! 

for my history class, all we do are group presentations. although i am burned out in the presentations department. this time, i was in charge of doing the powerpoint and the handouts, OH and WAIT!!! i also have to do a section in the talking bit, which i totally understand. i'm just frustrated, which is why i'm making a bog deal out of this. so much to do by tomorrow, because I LOVE TO PROCRASTINATE!!! FUN FUN!!! 

i think procrastination should be a disease and be treated! 

i am s....l....o...w...l...y starting to realize that i need to chill out about things. and i am trying to change. or at least go back to the way i used to be, before i started to easily freak out about things. i'm happy that ash-lay is 100% honest with me, because if she weren't, i wouldn't realize how i'm acting. yes i'm trying to get around something without actually saying it. Muahahahaha! so a chilled out less worrysome steph is on the way (hopefully). you just have to give me a bit of time to get used to it. 

OHHH how funny is this! i found out the other day that cliff apparently is either expecting a child soon, or has a new one. so that equals 2 (one is i believe 7 or 8 and the other is a youngin). which means that the entire time he's been calling me, trying to get back with me, he knocked up some girl. i was upset, but since i'm TRYING to start my new ways, i just laugh it off now. it freaks me out in a way, because that could have been me. yuck, but freaky.

my dad is looking for condos in the area. once again, i think this is funny too. (just thought i'd share that random comment.......hell, i am just one big random comment!) :) 
Burger, you have experienced the randomness and survived!!

toay i went to the saturn dealership for an oil change. that was an experience.....i waited for 2 hours!!! WHO DOES THAT?!? ah well, so i was waiting in the "lounge" when this lady came in and started bitching about how the people that worked there were treating her. once again, i thought it was funny, but wanted to be courteous. i listened to what she had to say, shook my head, and thought that would be enough so that i could go back to watching ellen and reading my magazine. but nope, she was a talker. 

i love it! ah well, will update latro!

okay i think that is it for the moment
http://gigawhat.livejournal.com/12662.html

WOW! what a weekend. friday was good, billybob came over and we just watched tv (like usual) and cuddled. saturday was fun! Burger came to the dorf which was a blast. i got caught up on her and she got caught up on me. i think i finally got her to say that guys were assy. we went up to bowie to eat, shop, watch a movie, and eat again. the funniest thing happened while we were at the movies! we got there a bit early and were just chatting, well i called billybob and got pissy because he was assy then one of the people that worked at the movies came in and started spraying airfreshener all over the place. it was crazy! she walked in front of us spraying. something i never would have expected, but i had to remember that we were still in pg county. 
Burger.....thanks a ton for coming down! anytime your free again let me know!
on sunday, i was by myself until about 545pm-ish. but when he was here it was amazing! he did things that he had never done before. and it was WOW! Burger, i'd have to tell you sometime! and he was so cute last night! Ugh! its so frustrating! they can be soooo assy one minute, then soooooo freakin cute the next. 

ah well, gotta get to class.
http://gigawhat.livejournal.com/12459.html

as of today, billybob and i have been together for a whole year! WOW! through all of the ups and downs, it has been worth it. 

i love him to death!!!

okay just wanted to share, off to wait for those trick-or-treaters
http://gigawhat.livejournal.com/12092.html

so, i happen to be beyond frustrated right now! I always seem to forget projects i need to do until it is the last minute! UGH!!!!!!

So I finally did my Edu. Psych. presentation on Problem-Based Learning. And now all that is left is my part of the group paper for my history class. UGH!!!!!

k gots tah get tah steppin!! Holla
http://gigawhat.livejournal.com/11895.html

WOW! I am flabergasted!

just when you think nothing could surprise ya, it comes and smacks you upside the head!  DAMN!
http://gigawhat.livejournal.com/11541.html

THANKS A TON SAM, KRYSTAL,AND CHRISTINA!!!! Thank you soooooo much for the references! I have my orientation on the 18th with the board of ed, so i'm assuming i got the job because the lady told me that the orientation was to go over "what to do" stuff and get finger printing done! YAY!!! Ya'll are too amazing!
So besides all of that jazz, which is SUPER DUPER cool, everything is good for now. 

Alrighty just wanted to say thanks a ton!!!


Sam and Burger......when are ya'll free?!? any weekends?
http://gigawhat.livejournal.com/11351.html

HAPPY BIRTHDAY BUTTONS!!! (snot tub) 

i'm super sorry that it is a bit late! i hope you had an awesome day!
http://gigawhat.livejournal.com/11146.html

alright guys, don't panic!! I thoght it would be cool to do that website thing and find out things about you, cause i know you ALL are little closet freaks!! :) BUTTTT.....i didn't get a single thing in my email! So no worries, its all still a secret! although i know how you feel! it happened to me before i posted it. 

Sorry!!!
http://gigawhat.livejournal.com/10877.html

HEY! you guys have got to try this! I did it, and was amazed at how true it was! Kinda freaky!

http://www.crush007.com/love.cgi?id=1128611337pyx

steph
http://gigawhat.livejournal.com/10717.html

how cute is he!?!? things at home are pretty rough. but i'm trying to keep a level head and get through it. i might have 2 jobs and school in the near future. can't wait!! that means a little bit of money, but hopefully enough in the long run to move out. they are with the board of ed and hecht's. so we will see where they both take me. Sam....they got your reference, but yours was the only one that they had. Thanks a ton once again!
http://gigawhat.livejournal.com/10311.html

So my dad isn't talking to me. Its been like this for about 2-3 weeks now. All because I don't have a government job. My mom and I think that the diet pills he's taking is effecting him in some way. Because he's been acting weird since he started taking them. He actually sent me a text message the other day saying that he found a teaching job in Iraq. WHAT IS HE THINKING?!?
I'm just trying to get A job so that i can get some money coming in. Then once I get it, i can start looking for a perminant job. I just need that green stuff (which is the stuff I LOATH!!) I also want to move out asap, and that is the only way i can do it.
Besides that, the board of ed. lost my reference forms. They say that they haven't recieved them. I think that is bull because one of my refs sent hers in 2 weeks ago! WHAT THE HEY!! is all that i can say. (hey that rhymed)
I can't say this enough......I LOVE BILLYBOB!!! More now than ever. He's amazing! Its almost been a year which is amazing in itself.
hmm......i guess my thing right now, is looking for a job and moving out. So if ya'll know of anyone that is hiring, let a sista know! :)
http://gigawhat.livejournal.com/10117.html

I totally forgot to say a lil something about the New York trip!!!

the ride up there wasn't all that bad when the driver FINALLY decided to get some air moving through the bus. apparently the air conditioning broke. once in new york, it was awesome. well, kind of. billybob loves just laying in bed and doing nothing. it doesn't matter when he is at. so we got our money's worth out of our hotel room. room service was good, not great, but tolerable. 
after a couple of hours, we realize that there is a firehouse right accross the street from our room. oh joy!! EVERY SINGLE time the truck left the place, he would jump up and watch it go. i have to admit that it was VERY cute the first coupld of times it happened because he was like an excited little boy. ah well, he's obsessed. it felt like we were stalking them in a way.
friday night, we meet up with splash, freckles, kenken, and poppins in Times Square. it was awesome to see them again. after eating kenken and poppins had to leave, so splash, freckles, billybob, and i go to toys r us. it was massive. once we had our little kid, get excited, look at toy,s play time end, the four of us went out seperate ways.
on saturday, billybob and i went to ground zero. he liked it. we walked around the entire area!!! they already have one of the buildings built! while we were there, there was apparently a bomb scare, so a huge part of the area was blocked off. it gave billybob time to take pictures of firetrucks. we stood there for a bit, staring at the firetrucks, of course i wanted to see the ambulances. but no, it was all about tose gosh darn firetrucks. after that whole thing we took a taxi back to the hotel cause his feet were hurting. he's too cute, i couldn't say no. we stayed there until sunday.
the bus ride back was great. he was my pillow, there was a movie that played, more leg room, and the airconditioning WORKED!!! YAY!!! (if you ever travel by bus, go by Peter Pan......NOT Greyhound!!!)

So that was new york summed up.
http://gigawhat.livejournal.com/9952.html

So, ever since i got back from camp, sleeping has been difficult. I just don't do it much. It is worse now, than ever. I get to bed at about 2am, wake up about 4 times and would be perfectly fine with staying up, but since there isn't anything to do, i go back to sleep. I can't sleep past 10am. When i wake up, it feels as if I never went to sleep to begin with. I'm actually getting less and less sleep, and my body seems to be okay with it. The only time, it seems, that i am able to sleep "normal" is when i'm sleeping with Billybob. It just doesn't make sense to me. 
A lot of things have been running through my head recently. Some good, some not so good. I guess we'll have to see what happens with that.
My parents are worried that i might have diabetes. WHAT THE HEY!!! When they told me that, I almost flipped. BUT it does run on both mom's and pop's side. 
I'm getting worried about Jeremy. The last I heard was that he was going to Iraq, but that was back in umm....i think June. He's supposed to be there for a year. The thing that worries me, is that he didn't pop into my head until recently. Although when i say pop, i mean pop. Out of no where. I just said to myself,"I want him here." Ugh!! I'm hoping that things are good and that there isn't anything to worry about.
The substitute job is still and i don't know. I'm going to call them tomorrow to see if my file is complete. (aka to see if they got all of my references)
Billybob is good. Or at least a lot better then i would be if i were in his situation. A friend of his that he practically grew up with passed away in a car accident, i think monday night. The viewing is tomorrow and the funeral is friday. If something like that happened to him, I don't know what i would do with myself. My heart goes out to that guys family. I've never had someone I knew/know pass away (knock on wood). But I can only imagine what it feels like. 
Today a guy came to take out a squirrel from our fireplace. It smelt DISCUSTING!!!! I'm not going to get into any details about it, but it wasn't pretty.
Classes are as good as they are going to get. I've got some pretty cool teachers this semester, which is a first. 
I'm tired of being home, so my goal is to save up money so that i can move my butt on out of here! ASAP! (might take some time, but at least its a goal)

Alrighty, I think that is all that is going on right now. Hope ya'll are doing great out in computer land!!!


Oh yeah, before I forget.......HAPPY BIRTHDAY KATY!!!!

Today is such a special one
Its Birthday time for you!
I'd really like to celebrate this happy day with you, 
SO, zippity ay and hidey ho there's something I can do
I'll write a song that we both knowwwwww......
Happy Birthday to YOU!

Happy Birthday to you
Woooooo! (high pitched, with your hands in the air)
Happy Birthday to you
Woooooo! (high pitched, with your hands in the air)
Happy Birthday to Katyyyyyyyy...... (slight pause)
Happy Birthday to YOU!!!!
(now run around your room banging pots and clapping your hands!!!)
http://gigawhat.livejournal.com/9707.html

Just wanted to say hey!!! Sooooo......HEY!!! :)

So, just 3 days until New York. I'm nervous and excited at the same time. 
I have the best of luck ever. (can ya sense the sarcasm?!?) I'm going to be on my cycle while i'm there!! UGH!! There's nothing i can do, but suck it up. 
Are there any good places in New York that you would suggest we go?!?

Gibbon....what happened?!?
http://gigawhat.livejournal.com/9227.html

HAPPY LABOR DAY!!!! (In about 45 minutes or so)

So today was cool!! I met up with Crystal to look at some miniature horses!! I REALLY WANT ONE NOW! They are so cute. She is going to get another one and hasn't decided on which one. she's stuck between a female that has one blue eye and one brown or a male that is sooooooo cute. he's the one that i want! he has short legs! and for those of you that know about my animal with short legs thing, then you know what i mean! The guy is selling the horses for $800, but he wasn't sure. I seriously CANNOT afford that, so i will try and convince crystal to get the male so that i can pretend he's mine and help her out. BUT before we went to look at the mini's, we went to Target! We saw this huge firetruck there that was i think 15 bucks. We debated on getting it for the guys at the firehouse, but nah. THEN, we saw these shoes that we both loved.....but of course, there was only one pair!!! WHO DOES THAT?!? (obviously target does) Crystal and I in Target are dangerous! We wanted to buy everything we put our hands on!!!
SO.....that was today. Billybob was supposed to come over tonight, BUT he ended up having to move hay for the second day in a row! He works himself too hard sometimes (both at work and at home). I love him to death! I think as each day passes i love him even more. he just amazes me more and more. I am actually getting SUPER excited about this weekend. Just being with him is going to be wonderful!
Okay let me stop before i get ahead of myself! Nighty Night!!!
http://gigawhat.livejournal.com/9102.html

hellooooooo all!! just wanted to post a lil sompin sompin!!

soooo school has started and it seems okay. my bio teacher needs some ass cause thats all that he talks about.
 
On the 9th i'm going with billybob to NY. Its his first OFFICIAL trip out of the state of maryland. (virginia doesn't count in my book.) So i'm hoping it turns out to be a good experience for him. I also get to see Splash, so I am super super excited!!! Oh and Freckles. (maybe KenKen, Poppins, and Tigger)

Money seems to be an issue, but when is it not? I hate the stuff with a passion. And i'm looking for a job, which is no fun. Might do some substituting.

hmm......just issues in general, but it'll all be good.

I had a "talk" with billybob last night about him joining Bel Alton. I don't like it, but he loves it down there. Just when i thought Cliff was out of my life, he comes right back in. Billybob and I are yet again a secret, and i hate it. Apparently everyone at bel alton knows about me and ugh......why?!?  WHATEVER!
http://gigawhat.livejournal.com/8745.html

Wow!!! What a boring week. Although I do have to share what happened yesterday!! Billybob called around 2 being an ass and telling me that he was outside, so i went to look and of course, he wasn't. We talk for a bit cause he's at the firehouse in Bel Alton. At about 430ish he calls me again and is being annoying. All he would say is why. The next thing i know, my doorbell rings. So i go downstairs to see who it was.......it was him!!! How cute is he?!? I love him to pieces!!!!! Athough he smelt like crab.
I'm listening to Seal. And I am addicted!! Last summer it was Luther, now its Seal. Pooh and Money got me hooked. This summer was slammed packed with drama. But it wouldn't be camp without it. The things that were told to me were shocking. But thats about it that i can share. I do miss it in a way, but then not. I have to admit that session 8 was awesome (besides the stress). We stole the extention cord and the fans from waterfront and put them in our glen shelter. We just plugged the cord into Ridge Lodge. 
Alrighty gotta go, but i'll try and update this thingy soon!
http://gigawhat.livejournal.com/8627.html

if ya'll were interested and haven't looked at them already, here's the link to where my pics are! Enjoy!!!

http://community.webshots.com/user/stephgigs

there are still a few more i have to add on there but thats the majority of them!!!
http://gigawhat.livejournal.com/8368.html

Helloooooo everyone out in computer land!! How are things?!? I can't say much over here. This summer has been an interesting one for me. VERY EMOTIONAL!! One minute i'm on a high, full of energy, loving everything.....then the next i'm down, thinking, don't care about anything. BUT the thing that sucks is that I am down, etc. the majority of the time. I hate feeling that way, but there seems to be nothing i can do about it. Ahhh well. Only 2 more weeks!!! And i got put in charge of finding somewhere to hold the banquet!! The pressure ;). Alrighty gotta go do grounds.....will hollar atcha all latro!!

Steph/Gigs
http://gigawhat.livejournal.com/8076.html

so i just about got back from Hawaii and it was georgeous!!!! (i got a tiny tan) I will deff dish more about it later but now its off to the shower to go to Crystals house to see Billybob and is retarted friends (I missed him sooooo freakin much!!) THEN home to get a tiny but of sleep to get up at 5am so i can pack for camp........THEN off to camp by 9am! I love not having enough time for anything.....can you sense the sarcasim!?!?!

hollar back ;)

Steph
http://gigawhat.livejournal.com/7929.html
AND I don't have an answer, so now i'm starting to wonder. Does anyone know how to get the morning after pill?!? Apparently people have been looking and can't find.
http://gigawhat.livejournal.com/7440.html

hi!!!! i should really be asleep right now, but i just can't do it! GRRR!! Soooooo, lets update. :)
Things are good so far. There is one more day of classes so i can't complain. AND its only going to be about 30 minutes long so thats even better!!! After class Ashley and I are going to Sakura which is awesome, but then not cause that means tomorrow's the last day i'll ever have a class with her. Which makes me sad, but i think we will live. (Hopefully)

OHHHH! So i'm laying in my room watching tv and at 12:15am someone calls my house from a private line. WHO DOES THAT?!?!

Anywho, today was the last day er ummm.....night for my Integrating the Special Ed Student class. It was a fun class! The teacher is AWESOME!!!! I learned a lot from this class too. I wish that all of the teachers i had/will have were all like her. Turns out i got an A in the class!!! WOO HOO!!!!! My first official A at CSM! (Because lifeguarding really doesn't count) Now i can add that with all of the B's and C's.

Billybob and I are doing good. I think we needed the weekend that we had, where it was just him and i. Everytime i'm with him, it seems that i love him so much more. Even though he has a gas problem, but you kind of get used to it after awhile. (thought you all would like to know :)

I'm STILL nervous about camp and am still drawing blanks. I got my staff manual from last summer and highlighted stuff, but i just don't know. It's easy for people to say "You went through it so just use what you learned when you were a CIT" BUT that was 6 years ago. OY!!! I can barely remember what i did a few days ago and they want me to go back 6 years?!? I'll figure something out though. It seems i do my best at the last minute, which is scary, but its going to have to do for now. (side note: I have to start packing for camp next week!! Ahhh!!)

I am super nervous about flying to Hawaii, and have a lot of anxiety about it. If the flight wasn't 10 hours, i might be able to handle it. I've flown a ton, but i still don't like to do it, and have had bad expierences. So i guess we will see what happens in about a week. 

okay, i think i'll end my babbling here. now that i read through it, all of this is really random, but its 1am.....WHAT ELSE DO YOU EXPECT?!?!

Night!! Sweetdreams!!!
http://gigawhat.livejournal.com/7298.html

I am sooooo freakin excited for tomorrow to come super quick!!! I hope this weekend is awesome!!! I really do. To Kill an American 

You probably missed it in the rush of news last week, but there was actually 
a report that someone in Pakistan had published in a newspaper an offer of a 
reward to anyone who killed an American, any American. 

So an Australian dentist wrote the following to let everyone know what an 
American is... so they would know when they found one. (Good on ya, 
mate!!!!) 

An American is English, or French, or Italian, Irish, German, Spanish, 
Polish, Russian or Greek. 

An American may also be Canadian, Mexican, African, Indian, Chinese, 
Japanese, Korean, Australian, Iranian, Asian, or Arab, or Pakistani, or 
Afghan. 

An American may also be a Cherokee, Osage, Blackfoot, Navaho, Apache, 
Seminole or one of the many other tribes known as native Americans. 

An American is Christian, or he could be Jewish, or Buddhist, or Muslim. 

In fact, there are more Muslims in America than in Afghanistan. The only 
difference is that in America they are free to worship as each of them 
chooses. 

An American is also free to believe in no religion. For that he will answer 
only to God, not to the government, or to armed thugs claiming to speak for 
the government and for God. 

An American lives in the most prosperous land in the history of the world. 

The root of that prosperity can be found in the Declaration of Independence, 
which recognizes the God given right of each person to the pursuit of 
happiness. 

An American is generous. Americans have helped out just about every other 
nation in the world in their time of need. 

When the Soviet army overran Afghanistan 20 years ago, Americans came with 
arms and supplies to enable the people to win back their country! 

As of the morning of September 11, Americans had given more than any other 
nation to the poor in Afghanistan. 

Americans welcome the best, the best products, the best books, the best 
music, the best food, the best athletes. But they also welcome the least. 

The national symbol of America, The Statue of Liberty, welcomes your tired 
and your poor, the wretched refuse of your teeming shores, the homeless, 
tempest tossed. These in fact are the people who built America. 

Some of them were working in the Twin Towers the morning of September 11, 
2001 earning a better life for their families. I've been told that the World 
Trade Center victims were from at least 30 other countries, cultures, and 
first languages, including those that aided and abetted the terrorists. 

So you can try to kill an American if you must. 

Hitler did. 

So did General Tojo, and Stalin, and Mao Tse-Tung, and every bloodthirsty 
tyrant in the history of the world. 

But, in doing so you would just be killing yourself. Because Americans are 
not a particular people from a particular place. They are the embodiment of 
the human spirit of freedom. Everyone who holds to that spirit, everywhere, 
is an American. 

Author unknown 

Pass this around the World

You Are 13 Years Old
13
Under 12: You are a kid at heart. You still have an optimistic life view - and you look at the world with awe. 13-19: You are a teenager at heart. You question authority and are still trying to find your place in this world. 20-29: You are a twentysomething at heart. You feel excited about what's to come... love, work, and new experiences. 30-39: You are a thirtysomething at heart. You've had a taste of success and true love, but you want more! 40+: You are a mature adult. You've been through most of the ups and downs of life already. Now you get to sit back and relax.
What Age Do You Act?
